column4: so - has the shipit program started shipping Breezy cds yet? I got a bunch of Hoary Hedgehog CDs that I mostly gave out trying to convert some people to Linux.
shipit has been shipping Breezy CDs since October last year :)

- oh ok... I will have to check my shipit account details to make sure I get some CD's - isn't Ubuntu on a six month schedule though? So by the time I'd probably get the CD's they'll be on the next release.
not sure when Dapper will ship - presumably in late April after release
